subtitleNullable: XML Sitemaps for News Websites in CSV Format
descriptionNullable:
### Context

XML sitemaps are a very easy, fast, and cheap way to gain insight on publishing trends. It's also not intrusive for the websites.


### Content

Sitemaps of several news organizations in CSV format. 

* [BBC](https://www.kaggle.com/eliasdabbas/news-sitemaps?select=bbc_sitemaps.csv)
* [BuzzFeed](https://www.kaggle.com/eliasdabbas/news-sitemaps?select=buzzfeed_sitemap.csv)
* [CNBC](https://www.kaggle.com/eliasdabbas/news-sitemaps?select=cnbc_sitemaps.csv)
* [TheEconomist](https://www.kaggle.com/eliasdabbas/news-sitemaps?select=economist_sitemap.csv)
* [Al-Jazeera](https://www.kaggle.com/eliasdabbas/news-sitemaps?select=aljazeera_com_sitemap.csv)
* [NewYorkTimes](https://www.kaggle.com/eliasdabbas/news-sitemaps?select=nytimes_sitemap.csv)


### Acknowledgements

Python, pandas, advertools

### Inspiration

It's very interesting to get such insights with minimal effort. There are so many ways to analyze the text in the URLs.
